dialogue.text: Say , Jim , how about going for a few beers after dinner ?
You know that is tempting but is really not good for our fitness .
Can you do push-ups ?
Of course I can . It's a piece of cake ! Believe it or not , I can do 30 push-ups a minute .
Can you study with the radio on ?
No , I listen to background music .
Are you all right ?
I will be all right soon . I was terrified when I watched them fall from the wire .
Hey John , nice skates . Are they new ?
Yeah , I just got them . I started playing ice hockey in a community league . So , I finally got myself new skates .
Hey Lydia , what are you reading ?
I ' m looking at my horoscope for this month ! My outlook is very positive . It says that I should take a vacation to someplace exotic , and that I will have a passionate summer fling !
Frank ' s getting married , do you believe this ?
Is he really ?
I hear you bought a new house in the northern suburbs .
That ' s right , we bought it the same day we came on the market .
Hi , Becky , what's up ?
Not much , except that my mother-in-law is driving me up the wall .
How are Zina's new programmers working out ?
I hate to admit it , but they're good . And fast . The Filipino kid is a genius .
Do you like cooking ?
Yes . I like cooking very much . I got this hobby when I was 12 years sold .
Anyone home ? Jen !
I'm in the kitchen ... let yourself in !
You look so tan and healthy !
Thanks . I just got back from summer camp .
Diana , do you like the perfume I gave you ?
It ' s good . But to tell you the truth , I don ' t wear perfume .
Ah , ah , ah ...
All right , Bill . Here ' s your daily exercise schedule . You are to jog before breakfast .
Hi Bill , I saw your grandma yesterday .
Oh where was that ?
I would like to register for a class today .
No problem , what class would you like to take ?
Dad , why are you taping the windows ?
Honey , a typhoon is coming .
Hi , my name is Lean , and I'm from Russia .
Nice to meet you , Lean . My name is Alike . I'm from Japan .
Can I help you ?
I hope so . I'm looking for some material for a paper I'm writing , and I'm not quite sure where to look .
Here ' s your hot dog and beer . What happened ? Did I miss anything ?
Yeah , Cal Ripen just hit a home run .
How do you like the pizza here ?
Perfect . It really hits the spot .
Do you have a light ?
Sorry , I don't smoke .
I was scared stiff of giving my first performance .
Were you ? your performance was excellent .
Excuse me . Could you please take a picture of us with this camera ?
Sure . Which button do I press to shoot ?
Every country should face the history .
Yeah , we don ' t live in the vacuum . We have traditional values and long but different history .
Do you like traveling , Kathy ?
I like traveling for pleasure to get places for vacation for instance . But I don ' t like traveling to work , waiting for buses , or ...
Your house is too small . Why not buy a big one .
I do wish I could afford one .
How do you do , Prof . Smith .
How do you do , Ms . Yang . You speak very good English .
Do you want black or white coffee ?
White , please
What do you like to do in your spare time ?
I like playing chess .
Where is John ? I can't find him anywhere .
Haven't you heard that he is in prison ?
Can I help you ?
I hope so . I'm looking for some material for a paper I'm writing , and I'm not quite sure where to look .
Hey , Ted . What are you up to this Friday ?
Well , I have the day off from work .
You honestly believe the world ' s improving every year ?
Yes , I do . I think that science is making us wiser . What do you think ?
What do you plan to do for your birthday ?
I want to have a picnic with my friends , Mum .
How may I help you ?
I would like to return this book .
What's the matter with you then ? You look miserable .
It's us .
Hi , Mary . You look pale today . What's the matter with you ?
I think I've caught a cold . Now I'm aching all over .
I feel like going for a drink , it's been a long day .
Great idea ! Peter , I could use the drink .
Could you tell me the right time , please ?
Well . My watch says five past two . But it ' s no use rely on it because it has been gaining and losing these last a few days .
does your family have a record of your ancestors ?
sure . My mom has been working on our family tree for years . She ' s always updating it .
Hi , Mr . Wang . Do you feel like going boating with me ?
Sounds interesting , I haven't gone boating for some time now , and what time ?
I hear that you've been to the Saikei Ski Resort for the weekend . Did you enjoy it ?
Yes , it's so exciting , though I had the most falls in our skiing team .
You look pale recently .
Yeah . I have got much pressure in the company . I have tobe wrapped upon my work .
Hey , Maggy , Did you hear about David ?
About David ? No , I didn ' t hear anything .
how do you usually get to school ?
I usually ride my bike . Which form of transport do you prefer to use ?
What's wrong with him ?
His nose is out of joint because we forgot to invite him to the party .
What are you going to do for one year abroad , Tom ?
Study , study , study . I want to learn a lot .
Isn't this lovely weather ? Will you help me water the flowers , Jack ?
Well , do you think I have to ?
On , darn . The grocery store is closed .
Yeah , this one closes at ten . We could drive to the 24 - hour store on sixth .
Do you think they two will get married ?
You can count on it .
Dad , where are we off to ?
First we will go to the city centre and stop for something to drink . Then we will visit the University Museum .
How about going to the cinema tonight ?
That's great . What's on tonight ?
I feel so uncomfortable .
Are you sick ?
I have made up my mind . I am getting a tattoo .
Really ? Are you sure ?
Excuse me , what's the screen near your steering wheel for ?
It's a portable TV . It's a popular thing now .
Oh , no !
How dreadful !
What do you do in your free time , Nancy ?
Well , I like playing the violin .
How can I tell her about this ?
Don't worry , you'll find a way .
What sports do you like to play ?
I like baseball and basketball .
What upsets you ?
My parents called . As usual , they reminded me again that I should have a plan to marry by my late 20s . Easier said then done . Who should I marry ? I have no time to go on a date .
Are you going to the party on Saturday ?
I was thinking about it . Are you ?
Could you talk to me for a few minutes about my grades ?
Step into my office for a moment . What is your concern ?
Good luck on your test tomorrow . We'll be crossing our fingers for you !
Thanks .
I'll never ever work together with him !
What happened ? Quarrel again ?
Oh , my God ! I've been cheated !
What ? What did you buy ?
Is the clock right ?
I'm afraid it gains a little .
Hey , Mary , what's up ?
Just so so . Last night I met this great guy at the bar and we had such a wonderful time , so we decided to meet again tonight .
What ' s up ? You don ' t look too good .
Yeah , my head hurts , that ' s all . I ' Ve been in physics class all day . It ' s killer !
Today more and more people advocate lifelong learning . But people have different views about lifelong learning . How do you understand lifelong learning ?
I think lifelong learning is the concept that it's never too soon or too late for learning
How old are you ?
Nine ... but I'll be ten on May 1st . When is your birthday ?
It smells like an ashtray in here !
Hi honey ! What ' s wrong ? Why do you have that look on your face ?
Why are you shivering ?
It's freezing .
It seems that you get antsy when you hear I praise another guy .
I get antsy not because you praise a guy , but because you may be taken for a ride by a guy like him .
Cheese ! It tastes like cardboard .
I think so . Maybe that ' s why it ' s cheap here .
Have you signed up to join the company ' s Christmas party ?
Sure , I have . Will you join ?
If the weatherman's predictions are accurate , it should rain tomorrow .
I hope not . Then we'd have to reschedule our baseball game .
hi , Emily , do you know that guy over there ?
The tall one ? Sure , that's Drive , he works with Lily .
You didn't ring me last night . You said you would .
I'm sorry to have made you disappointed .
Hi , Nicole . Did you have a good weekend ?
Yes , I did . But I feel tired today .
There will be a parade to celebrate National Day this weekend .
What's the route ?
Excuse me . I'm afraid you're in my seat . You've moved my books .
Oh , dear .
What ' s the life expectancy in your country ?
I ' m not sure , but probably about 75 years . How about in your country ?
I'm going to Japan this year on vacation .
Have you ever been to America ?
Hey , Mark , long time no see .
Julie ! It's good to see you again . How have you been ?
Could I see the manager please ? I have a complaint to make .
Yes , I ' m the manager here . What can I do for you , Madam ?
Congratulations , Vivian . You won the grand prize , again .
Isn't it just great ! I just knew I'd win !
We are going to the concert this evening . Will you join us .
I'm very sorry I can't .
You'v been work here for nearly a month , how do you feel about the job ?
Not bad . Thank you for your help . I am always busy with this job , I feel a bit tired .
The music is on . May I have the pleasure to dance with you ?
Sorry , I'm engaged for the foxtrot . Will the next Walls be all right ?
Excuse me , is this seat taken ?
No , please feel free .
Look at this headline , Soo Mi .
Wow ! So many people in the United States get divorced !
Boy ! What a beauty ! I fall in love with her at the first sight .
The beauty under the tree ?
Excuse me . Where do I register ?
Oh , over there in Pacific Pavilion .
How was your education going on in Australia ?
I'm going to graduate this summer .
Do you have any particular hobbies , Tom ?
Oh , yes . I love playing badminton , table tennis and computer games . And playing the games has become my favorite .
What ' s the plot of your new movie ?

It ' s a story about a policemen who is investigating a series of strange murders . I play the part of the detective . He has to catch the killer , but there ' s very little evidence . It ' s a psychological th
Who's that old lady trimming the trees ?
She's my grandma .
Mom . My legs are killing me .
Hold on . We will be successful right away .
Oh , man . I had the best supper last night . My wife made a stir-fry and it was amazing !

I love stir fry crispy bitesize vegetables covered in a mixture of soy sauce and oyster sauce . Wilted greens and fresh bean sprouts . Throw in some onion and garlic and ginger ! Mmm ! Mmm ! It ' s almost lunchtime . I would die for a plate of stir fry right now !
What did you say ?
I said it's a lovely day . Why don't we go for a walk ?
Thank god you showed up when you did ! He ' s insane ! Do you think we should call the police ?
Don ' t worry about it , I ' ll call my friend and have him take care of it . I can ' t believe he was stalking you all these years . What a nut job !
Zina , can I talk to you about something personal ?
As long as it doesn't take too long .
Mary , how was your date with john ?
it's ok . It seems we have a lot in common .
Hi , Francis , how was your business trip ?
It was a nightmare .
So the company decided to cancel your trip to Hong Kong ?
Yes , The SARS epidemic is not under effective control yet . So I'd better not risk it .
Which pair of jeans do you like best ?
I really like the straight legs .
Hi , Charles . What's the matter ?
Oh ! ! My car isn't working . I'm waiting for a tow-truck .
Happy anniversary , sweetheart !
Yes . to our first anniversary and many more to come . Cheers !
What do you plan to do for your birthday ?
I want to have a picnic with my friends , Mum .
How about seconds , Victor ?
No . thanks . I'm full .
Why don't you have dinner with me tonight ?
I'd love to .
Cigarette ?
Oh , uh ... Thanks . Henry , do you have a light ?
Hi Rose , what are you busy with right now ?
Hi Jack , I'm working on these documents . The manager wants them for half an hour .
How do you shoot pool ?
You have 16 balls on the table , 7 solid colored , 7 striped colored , a black 8 ball , and the white ball .
How about going to hear a country-and-western singer tonight ?
I'd enjoy that .
The mosquitos are biting me !
Me , too , I can ' t stop scratching . They are everywhere ! Sneaky little jerks .
Stop running around in front of the TV , will you ? Why don't you just sit and watch ?
I've tried , but I can't stand the bald man talking so loudly in the program .
Okay , can I ask you something direct ?
Ha ! It's not like you've ever been one to beat around the bush .
My daughter plans to quit her present job and wants to find another . She says she wants to get a better job with higher pay .
It seems quite normal to me . It is pretty much what I want to do .
Please excuse me , but I really have to be going .
Yes , of course . It was nice to see you .
Excuse me . Is this seat taken ?
I'm afraid so .
What do you think of the coming match ?
Winning is a piece of cake to me .
What would you reckon the taxing increases ?
Well , the state will benefit a lot , I suppose .
are you still coming to my place for dinner tomorrow night ?
of course . Is the dinner still on ?
Jack wonders whether Linda likes him or not .
Why doesn't he ask her ?
I don't understand why some parents keep beefing and complaining about their daughters not being able to follow suit .
Yeah . Li Na's mother has been building a fire under her since her neighbour's daughter got married with a Canadian . She's almost driving Li Na crazy .
Where is John ? I can't find him anywhere .
Haven't you heard that he is in prison ?
What do you need ?
I need to use the Internet .
What a nice tie you are wearing !
Thank you . But does it really look all right ?
What do you make of the case ?
If you ask me , I don ' t think it ' s guilty .
Happy Mother's Day , Mom !
Thanks ! These are beautiful . You shouldn't have !
I have a real problem when I meet people .
What is it ? Maybe I can help .
Sam , I am so sorry . It was your birthday yesterday and I completely forgot about it .
Don't worry about it . I keep forgetting everyone's birthdays as well .
Here's the restaurant we're meeting the Smiths at .
Let's go in to wait for them .
When do you usually go to the movies ?
I usually go in my free time on the weekends . How about you ?
Are you telling us a lie again ?
I will be hanged if I lying .
I can't believe Mr . Fro didn't buy it . Who does that guy think he is anyway ? Bill Gates ?
He had a lot of nerve telling us our ads sucked .
Come on , Tara . Let ' s go up to the window and buy two tickets . The movie is starting in a few minutes .
We can ' t break into the line . Don ' t be so impatient . We ' ll be at the front of the line soon .
Do you often buy magazines ?
I buy a computer magazine every month . It keeps me up-to date with all the latest developments .
Mumm . Those burgers smell great . It's perfect day for a barbecue .
It sure is . I'm glad it didn't rain . My name's Mike Gates , by the way .
Wow ! I can't believe I'm standing here !
What are you so excited about ?
hey , Maris , are you a part-timer ?
part-timer ? Is that a new buzzword ?
Have you seen that house ?
Yes , it looks interesting .
Have you got any hobbies ?
Yes . I'm fond of playing the chess and I'm very keen on playing cards .
Jim , how was your weekend ?
I went to the beach with my friends and had a barbecue there .
You'd better prepare for the examination .
I don't think the exam will be very hard .
It is high time you have a talk with him . That may help clear the mists .
I did , but he gives me a runaround .
What is the correct time , please ?
It's exactly twelve minutes past seven .
Should I ask Sara to the party ?
I would if I were you .
If he promised to help you , I'm sure he will help . He's a man of his word .
You said it . I always count on him when I need his help .
We're having a sixties party next week . Do you want to come ?
What is a sixties party ?
I want to improve my handwriting , and I've practiced it for several weeks , but nothing happened . You see , my handwriting is still bad .
Oh , come on . You know it's a long process , you have to be patient .
I ' m so excited , mother . Oh , a new baby !
My first grandchild .
The music has started .
How do you like this waltz ?
Do you speak only English in the class , or does your teacher explain everything to you in Spanish ?
Oh , we never speak Spanish in class ! Miss . Parker speaks to us only in English .
Doris , I'm glad you're home . I'm terrified . I don't know what to do !
What is it ? What happened ?
Han Maimed , What's your plan for the weekend ?

I plan to travel around Harvard University and know more about it . To tell you the truth , I plan to apply for Harvard after graduation from high school . It ' s better to get to know it . What about you ?
I am not convinced by your explanation . Could you explain it ?
Sorry , I really can't do that . There's little time left for us .
What do you do in summer ?
I love going out into the countryside for walks or bike ride . I love being out in the fresh summer air . How about you ?
I will never forget Linda . After all , she was my first lover .
I think you ' ll lay it to rest with the time flying .
Could you tell me what university you want to go to , John ?
Pardon ?
I've been chosen to plan the next family reunion .
Fun for you ! Do you get to do anything you want ?
Hi , my name is Lean , and I'm from Russia .
Nice to meet you , Lvan . My name is Alike . I'm from Japan .
What did you think of the film ?
I liked it . I thought it was great .
What ' s up ? You don ' t look too good .
Yeah , my head hurts , that ' s all . I ' Ve been in physics class all day . It ' s killer !
Which film shall we see ?
There is nothing good at the moment . Let ' s do something different . Would you like to go to a concert ?

Everyone wants to be financial lose kill . You must invest your savings if you planed to retire rich . I ' m thinking about buying stocks . It can be a good investment if I can manage well . What do you say ?

I partly agree with you . Buying stocks is not difficult , but making money consistently from buying stock is very difficult . Even professionals don ' t find it easy , so be careful . Anyway , people like us need help with investing . Why not do some online research ? There are data , reports and discussion forums to educate people on how to invest . In addition , you need to visit an established website that offers stock charts .
Can I borrow your suit ?
That's out of the question .
Bill , how can you hear so happy today ?
Aha . I've read of my roommate . I made a move today .
Where are you from ?
I'm from Guangzhou .
Well , I must be off now . I have an appointment at six .
In that case , I won ' t keep you any longer . Drop in anytime .
Hey ! How was your first day of class ? I ' m in level two and I ' m loving my class this semester ! It ' s great being in a class of international students !
Mine was ok , except that no one in my class speaks English . I guess it will force me to converse in Chinese more in class so at least I should improve a lot this semester .
Hey , I'm hungry . How about you ?
Yeah , I can really go for some Chinese food right now .
Good morning , Miss Li .
Morning , Mike .
Do you like flowers ?
Of course , I like .
What is the weather like today ?
It stops snowing , but there's a bit wind .
What kind of music do you like listening to ?
I like music that has a fast beat and is lively , like dance music . You know , I go to a disco almost every week . Sometimes it's too loud though . You prefer classical music , don ' t you ?
There is a new coffee shop opening up down the street .
I hope that they have a good menu . Most coffee shops only have coffee and Danish .
Darling , I have news for you . Bobby and his wife , Evelyn , are going to have a baby soon .
Really ? I thought his wife couldn ' t have a baby .
Well , I am a regular member of this club .
Do you have to pay to join ?
The concert was really great .
I agree .
I have tickets to The Phantom of the Opera on Friday night . Would you like to go ?
Thanks . I'd love to . What time is the show ?
Is the Chinese team taking the lead ?
No , it's the Japanese team .
Do you mind if I ask your friend out ?
Of course , but we aren't going out , we're just friends .
Harry is so down that he won't talk to anyone .
I know only too well what that's like .
Hi , Is that David ?
Hi , Jenny . It's David here .
This is a nice set of wheels . How much did the dealer charge you for this ?
A lot . I probably got to moonlight for the rest of my life , but so what , it ' s worth it . Come on , get in . Let ' s take a drive .
When's your birthday ?
It's just around the corner .
Bob is getting on in years .
Yeah , I'm very worried about his health .
Which church do you attend ?
I am Mormon , so I go to the Church of Jesus Christ of Latter Day Saints .
Sorry I was late for the meeting today . I got stuck in traffic .
That's okay . Better late than never .
Hello ! What are you reading about in the newspaper ?

Hello ! I was exhausted some studying , so I decided to read the newspaper to relax . Unfortunately , the news is so depressing . There has been another murder in the city center . I ' m shocked that the police haven ' t caught the killer yet .
Hi ! Tom . Want to go to play bowling tonight ?
Sounds good . When and where shall we meet ?
Are there many idioms in English ?
There are hundreds and hundreds . English is particularly rich in idiomatic expressions .
Why did the teacher criticise Myra in front of the whole class ?
Because Myra was cheating on exams , and she spoke back rudely .
Do you know where I can park ?
Do you need a spot here or off campus ?
Have you heard of the Love Bug ?
Do you mean the ' I love you ' virus that attacks computers through e-mail ?
I am confused by what he said .
Why do you say that ?
Where are you going ?
I ' m going to the hospital .
Want to meet for lunch this Saturday ?
Sorry , I can't . I am busy .
Are the children all grown up now , Rose ?
Oh , yes . Laura ' s the oldest . She ' s a computer programmer .
Merry Christmas , Linda !
Merry Christmas , Lee !
Where's your better half ?
She's at home .
Look , there are some words on the fish .
I know that they are auspicious fish . It's quite popular nowadays .
Who's singing in your home , Jim ?
It's Ellie and her friends .
Well , it was nice meeting you .
Yes , I hope we meet again .
I saw an interesting program on TV last night . It was about elderly people .
And what did the program say ?
Did you see the information on sales for last year ? The sales review was made at our last board meeting . There's a great news for our shareholders .
Yeah , I went over the figures this morning . We're finally started making money again !
What a letdown . I wanted to experience some Mafia culture firsthand .
It's worth it just to go and eat what the mafia eat ! The five-dollar tiramisu is a culinary orgasm .
Did you get any rewards or honors in college ?
Yes , I received the scholarship 3 times on end .
Your brand new car is so excellent . I like it very much .
Let ' s go for a joy ride .
Are you watching the soccer match tonight ? It must be the most exciting one in this season .
Well , of course I can ' t miss it . Which team are you for ?
The weekend's finally here !
And it's a long one . I have Monday off . It's Memorial Day or something like that .
Hi , Martin . I ' Ve been looking for you all morning .
What ' s up ?
You know , Taylor's been in the hospital for a couple of days .
And I'm the one who put him there with my football moves .
Did you see Ally Mabel last night ?
Yes , I did . Did you ?
Look out ! Your tea water is running over .
Oh , would you please turn off the fire ? My hands are sticky with the dough .
Did you see May today ?
Yes , but why does she have such a long face ?
I don't think the teacher had a right to say that . The teacher was wrong to have accused her in front of the whole class .
You've got to be joking ! It's the teacher's right to say anything wants , and if she saw Myra cheating , she certainly had the right to say so .
Come on in . I am so glad you are here . We have been expecting you .
Am I late for the party ? Looks everyone is already here . Hope I didn ' t miss something interesting .
Steven , would you like to go dance with us tonight ?
John , I am just not in the mood for this .
The band is pretty good . How do you like the music ?
It's very nice . I haven't heard live music in a while . This is fun .
I think the biggest environment problem in my country is air pollution .
Yes , I agree . The air here is much more polluted than in my country . Of course , my country is more agricultural and has much less industry .
I just had a terrible week .
What a shame !
I ' m so excited , mother . Oh , a new baby !
My first grandchild .
When do you go to bed usually ?
I go to bed at ten and get up at six .
Have you been ever been to Disneyworld ?
When I was young , my parents took me to the one in California . I always forget which -- is that one Disneyland or Disneyworld ?
Can you speak French ?
Yes , I can , but not very well .
you look better today . How did your test go ?
much better than it did yesterday .
Can I borrow your Cds for our school dance ?
Oh , you don't ask much , do you ?
Do you want to go to the beach tonight ?
Sure , which beach are we going to ?
There are so many environment problems in the world today . Do you think we can really solve them all or will destroy the world ?
I hope that world leaders can get together and agree on a plan for action , but I doubt it ' ll happen before it ' s too late .
Kathy ! How are you ? It's been ages ! What are you doing these days ?
I just opened my own restaurant . I'm also head chef .
Susan , I am inviting you and Frank to our house warming party this weekend .
A house warming party ?
What can I do for you ?
I am trying to find this book .
ABC Rent-a-Car . May I help you ?
I would like to rent a car . What kind of car do you have ?
Would you be willing to accompany me to the party tonight ?
Sure , I'd love to .
Which film shall we see ?
There is nothing good at the moment . Let ' s do something different . Would you like to go to a concert ?
Spring Festival is the most important festival in China , isn't it ?
Yes , that's true .
I'm really sick of waiting for a bus .
Yeah . Especially when you have something urgent to do .
I feel absolutely horrible . My temperature is 41 degrees Celsius , and I've got a headache and a runny nose .
do you have any other symptoms ?
I haven't got enough evidence for prosecuting him .
Why don't you find someone who is in the know .
What are you two doing in here ?
We heard you weren't feeling well , so we came to check on you .
You're not looking happy . What ' s the matter ?
Oh , nothing special . I'm just a bit tired .
Oh dear , Miss , you are soaked ! Wow , it's really raining heavily outside .
Yes , it sure is . I had to run here from work ! I need to rush as I'm on my lunch break .
Dad , what's the date ?
It's December eighteenth .
What happen , John ?
Nothing .
This man is your fiance , Dolly ?
Yeah , how do you like him ?
Do you think I should buy this now and bring it with us ?
Don't bother . those are a dime a dozen where we are going .
Brooke , are you still mad ? Is your mom mad ?
No ... mom said that we'll have the wedding at home on the 2nd . So let's hope your mom is right about that being a lucky day ...
The world changes , the family changes too .
What do you mean ?
What was that all about ?
We had a difference of opinion .
Is sailing fun ?
You bet !
John dates her seven times a week .
Really ? That's a straws in the wind .
I was told my friend Joe was speaking ill of me . That's a real let-down .
I don't think Joe has done such a thing . Don't believe things in haste .
Good morning , Loans .
Good morning , Mr . Smith .
Which countries have you been to ?
I ' Ve been to most of the countries in Europe , several countries in asia-china , Japan , korea , and Thailand-and to the united states and Canada .
Alison , would you like to have some more ?
No thanks . I have had enough .
Welcome to my birthday party , I am so happy you can come .
Thanks for inviting me . Here is the gift for you . Happy birthday , Francis ! Many more happy and healthy years for you !
Did you read the news that ' China's property prices rose at the fastest pace in 18 months in December , ending the year with rising fears of bubbles in the property market ' ?
No . Does the newspaper say what has caused that ?
I think that show biz stars have a really easy life . They have lots of money , so they can buy almost anything they want . They ' re famous , so everyone loves them .
I think they must have horrible lives . All the paparazzi take photos of them wherever they go and whatever they do . They must get sick of it .
Hi , it is a pleasant surprise !
Yeah , it ' s been ages ! So how have you been ?
Hey , Mary , can you cut that out ?
Cut what out I ' m not doing anything .
The weather in Beijing is just beautiful !
Autumn is the best season in Beijing , you know .
Mike , come and look at this painting of shrimp ! It is so simple yet so vivid !
Yeah . It is incredible ! Is it the work of Qi Bakshi ?
Lousy weather , isn't it ?

What's your ideal boss ?

I have had an incredible boss , who was my direct supervisor during the last year of my coop work experience . A-bout two months after I began working for her , she really let me spread my wings . She encouraged me to work independently , because she said she had come to trust my judgment and commitment . So I was able to move forward on projects without having to check in with her every day . Of course , I made certain that she knew what I had accomplished on a daily and weekly basis because I gave her summary reports , although she didn't specifically ask me to . Without her support and encouragement , I don't think I would have felt confident enough to have written up a proposal suggesting that the department change a process that had been in place for a long time . But she was open to suggestions , so long as employees could back them up with research and facts . When I submitted my suggestion , she reviewed it and told me where she thought it needed more work . She then took my revised proposal to her boss . He was a more conservative type , but she lobbied him to try It for several weeks . He did , and it was so successful that it was instituted as a permanent change . I've also worked for some very difficult bosses in summer and part-time jobs . And while I'd certainly prefer to work for one like I've just described , I'm the kind of person who can get along with just about anyone .

Each party produces and supplies a part of the components and parts ; one party is a Chinese enterprise , the other , an overseas firm . In 1986 , a New Zealander Hackett popularized Bungee as a commercialized sport of mass entertainment . This sport is very challenging . It is a test of people's psychological ability of endurance . Especially when descending , as if they are watching a fast forward tape and when they bounce back , they sway around . The timid people will shrink back at the sight of it . Even if they jump off , they find it hard to avoid screaming with closed eyes . No wonder people give the title ' brave ' to anyone who jumps off .

You see , the bungee participants take a deep breath when they stand at the starting spot and then , like diving , their heads are over heels and they jump off into the realm of the combination of heaven and earth . The wind roars at their ears and their bodies rapidly descend . They do not even have enough time to do several gymnastic movements and they are rebounded to the upper air by the cord .

China is now a member of world trade organization . As a member of TO , China will have to make some changes in its economic policies so that it can follow the routines practiced by other TO members . Is it fair to China , do you think ?

It's a hard question , but I'm sure the reexamination of China's economic policies in the past may lead us to a right answer to the question . After the establishment of new China , our government employed numerous economics policies to stimulate the growth of China's economy . These policies , however , favored our domestic enterprises and protected them from international competition and these policies have contributed a lot to the rapid growth of both China economy and our domestic enterprises . After China's entry into TO , Chinese domestic enterprises will have to compete with their foreign counterparts . This new situation entails some changes of Chinese economic policies . These changes will spur Chinese enterprises to strengthen their competitiveness in the long run .
